transcript: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back because it might hurt somebody else. My whole bloody life time, after time, after time.

segments.text: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back because it might hurt somebody else.
My whole bloody life time, after time, after time.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know why it is but every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back because it might hurt somebody else, my whole bloody life, time after time, after time.
